name: Walks For Your Charity
short_description: Walks For Your Charity was set up for the soul purpose of raising money for all kinds charities all over the United Kingdom. We complete all different types of walks ranging from short one mile walks to long distance walks covering hundreds of miles. We encourage people to join us from all different walks of life and abilities to walk with us as well for their chosen charity. If you would like us to complete a walk for your charity or for the charity you support all you have to do is contact us, its that simple. You contact us and we do all the leg work. Please note:- we do not raise monies via collection buckets for your charity. ALL donations will be will be collected on line to protect YOUR donations. Please ask us for details.
summary: We walk all over the United Kingdom for your charity
